definition: Johnnie To (1955-), Hong Kong film director
surname Du
birchleaf pear (tree)/to stop/to prevent/to restrict
fine jade
(of a mountain) high and tapered peak or summit/mountain-like in appearance/highest level/classifier for camels
old variant of 峰[feng1]

sentences.english: Eventually unremitting efforts of Johnnie To has been affirmed.
sentences.chinese: 杜琪峰多年的不懈努力，终于受到肯定。

sentences.english: Who would have thought that the person to make a movie about this would be Johnnie To?
sentences.chinese: 谁曾料想，拍出了反映这一现状影片的人会是杜琪峰？

sentences.english: Du Qifeng is a dazzling star in Hong Kong Film circle mounts in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 杜琪峰是近年来香港影坛上的一颗耀眼明星。

sentences.english: Johnnie To abandoned the appearance of the gangster genre but to narrate the feeling course behind the heroes.
sentences.chinese: 杜琪峰放下英雄的外观，讲述英雄背后的心路历程。
